changes.heading: What has changed?
changes.text: A describing text has been added to the recipe category tag (Vegetarian).

reason.heading: Why?
reason.text: Purely visual elements (like colors or shapes) should not be the only way of informing users. They should be accompanied with another indicator that transports the meaning.

changes.heading: What has changed?
changes.text: Headings were added to separate sections of the recipe page.

reason.heading: Why?
reason.text: Proper headings help users navigate the page structure more efficiently, especially for assistive technologies.
